events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th, resulting in significant damage to the front bumper and hood.
Claim was categorized under Auto Accident following the receipt of initial damage description and incident details.
An agent was assigned to the case to facilitate communication and oversee the claim process for the damaged vehicle.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and the customer was informed about the next steps in the investigation.
Customer was requested to provide copies of the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and medical reports related to the accident.
Customer submitted all required documents including police report, photos, and a medical certificate for injury assessment.
Investigation has commenced, with assigned agent contacting involved parties and verifying submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded confirming the validity of the claim and extent of damages due to the vehicle collision.
A settlement offer was proposed based on damage assessment and repair cost estimates evaluated by the claim team.
Customer responded with agreement to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the service so far.
Claim approved by the insurance manager following confirmation of all documentation and settlement terms.
Settlement payment was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover vehicle repairs.
The auto insurance claim was officially closed. Customer was informed and given opportunity for further assistance.
All claim files and documentation were archived securely for future reference and regulatory compliance.
